name: Apart Together
description:
In Apart Together two friends are forced apart into separate dimensions. You need to help them work with each other to solve puzzles across two overlapping worlds and come together at the end of each level. Use special cross dimensional abilities and find ways to help each friend traverse their world with help from across the rift.

Controls:

  • Move: A/D
  • Jump: Space
  • Swap Character/World: Shift
  • Interact: F
  • Use Ability: Enter
  • Drop Item: G
  • Reset Level: R
